file.string: Comprehensive overview of your event management system
Complete guest list management for both venues
Detailed volunteer benefits and status tracking
Complete shift tracking and job management
Configure Google Sheets synchronization and app settings
Get this from your Google Sheets URL: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/SPREADSHEET_ID/edit
Upload your Google Service Account JSON key file
Upload your Google Service Account JSON key file
How often to sync with Google Sheets (1-60 minutes)
Google Sheets is configured and ready for sync
Google Sheets is not configured. Please check your settings.
Disable animated arches for better performance on older devices
Enable slide animations when switching pages and tabs
Choose a color theme for devices that don\'t support dynamic colors
The color theme has been changed. Please restart the app to see the new theme applied.
Adjust the resolution scale to make the UI smaller or larger. Drag the slider to change the scale from 80% (BIG) to 120% (SMALL).
Configure shift types and their rank eligibility
Follow these steps to set up Google Sheets synchronization:
Go to Google Cloud Console and create a new project or select an existing one.
In your project, enable the Google Sheets API from the APIs & Services section.
Create a service account in IAM & Admin > Service Accounts. Download the JSON key file.
Use the \'Upload Key File\' button in Settings, or manually place the JSON file in app/src/main/assets/ as \'service_account_key.json\'
Create a new Google Spreadsheet and copy its ID from the URL.
Create five sheets: \'Guest List\', \'Volunteers\', \'Shifts\', \'Shift Types\', and \'Volunteer Guest List\'
Add headers to each sheet. The app will create them automatically, but you can set them up manually if needed.
Share the spreadsheet with your service account email (found in the JSON file) with Editor access.
Enter the Spreadsheet ID and sheet names in the settings above.
This will test the connection to your Google Sheets using the current settings.
This action will permanently delete %d volunteer%s and all their associated job records. This cannot be undone!

Volunteer \'%1$s\' (ID: %2$s) not found in database. Please check if the volunteer data has been synced from Google Sheets.
Choose how dates and times are displayed throughout the app
Hours to add before the date changes (e.g., +3 hours = 03:00). Benefits and shifts will last until this time instead of midnight.
Camera hardware is not available or not working on this device
Number of volunteers who had a shift within the last year at each point in time
Shows how many volunteers were considered active (had a shift within the last year) at each date
Number of shifts completed by volunteers over time, organized by venue
Number of shifts completed at %1$s over time
Total number of shifts completed across all venues over time
Guest list statistics showing volunteers with access and their available invitations
Number of volunteers who had guest list access at each point in time
Total number of invitations that volunteers with guest list access could give at each point in time
Total number of people on the guest list (volunteers with access + their available invitations) at each point in time
Number of free drinks available over time
Distribution of genders among active volunteers
Distribution of ages among active volunteers
No age data available for active volunteers
Your device\'s time or date is incorrect. Google Sheets API requires accurate time synchronization to work properly.

How to fix:

1. Go to Settings
2. Look for "Date & Time" or "System"
3. Enable "Automatic date & time" or "Set time automatically"
4. If not available, manually set the correct date and time
5. Restart the app and try syncing again

Common on older tablets - please check your device settings!
Rate limit exceeded. Please wait 1-2 minutes before trying again.
Authentication failed. Please check your Google Sheets configuration.
Permission denied. Make sure your service account has editor access to the spreadsheet.
Network error. Please check your internet connection.
Invalid configuration. Please check your settings.
Spreadsheet not found. Please check the spreadsheet ID.
Sheet not found. Please check the sheet names in your configuration.
Invalid data format. Please check your Google Sheets structure.
An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

Auto-adapt enabled. Icon will update based on system theme.

Control how the header (add, filters, search) behaves when you scroll the Volunteers, Guest List and Shifts pages.
Only the list scrolls. The top actions (add, filters, search) stay visible at the top.
The header and the list scroll together. The top actions move away as you scroll down.
